title: Room in Kecamatan Kuta, Indonesia
description:
## About this space

Need more than 1 bed or just like having extra space? Then you've found your spot! A loft-like space with fun corners and dedicated workplaces. Our biggest room has 2 stores and 2 separate (but integrated) beds areas… Great for family, friends travelling together and digital nomads.

Beyond your loft, enjoy our lounge areas or refresh in the pool. A fully equipped kitchen is available to you and a superb breakfast is provided daily, with no time restriction. Welcome to our secret home!

## The space

Room 01 – India Room

The most roomy and fashionable of our four rooms, This room is made to suit your needs whether you're travelling for business or pleasure. You'll appreciate the room's generous size and the fact that it has spaces for working, relaxing, and lounging.

**Features:**
- ✔ The Biggest Room of the Villa
- ✔ 2 king Beds
- ✔ Full Private Bathroom with Shower
- ✔ Double Story Room (Loft)
- ✔ Dedicated Working Space
- ✔ Max Guests = 04
- ✔ Pillows, Linens, and Sheets
- ✔ Closet with Hangers and Shelves
- ✔ Cabinet with Spacious Drawers

Can work as a perfect family and friends room too, as it has double beds.
cancellationPolicy: 48 hours after booking: Full refund: Get back 100% of what you paid.
